title: New: Blaenavon – My Bark Is Your Bite
content:
After a couple of years of uncertainty and Two Door Cinema Club impressions, Liphook trio Blaenavon are starting to take this music thing seriously.

Having recently signed to Canvas Back / Atlantic Records in the States, and with their debut album soon to be announced, it’s starting to feel like everything is falling into place for the youngsters. With recent single Let’s Pray gaining serious online traction and proving a recent favourite at live shows with The Hunna (we can forgive them for that), they’ve released another taster from the LP. My Bark Is Your Bite is another indie-crossover in waiting, and a recent addition to their electrifying live set – which, in truth, is now one of the strongest I’ve seen in recent times. This debut album is shaping up to be rather special. Check out My Bark Is Your Bite below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
